summary:
Microsoft is an American tech company that makes famous software like Windows and Microsoft 365. It also creates hardware like Xbox and Surface. Founded in 1975 by Bill Gates and Paul Allen, it became super successful, making many people rich.

Over time, Microsoft expanded, buying other companies like Activision Blizzard and LinkedIn. It's one of the biggest and most valuable companies globally, known for its software, gaming, and cloud services. Microsoft has faced criticism but remains a leading tech brand.
title: Microsoft
